numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that people in the 70th percentile are below average.
2. I noticed that people in the 90th percentile are below average.
3. A legacy status gives a boost.
4. If a person has a legacy status then the person is more likely to get in.
5. I wonder how this graph would change depending on the year when someone took it.
6. I wonder why the 75th percentile is below average.
7. I wonder why the 90th percentile is below average.
8. I wonder why the 10th percentile of income is above average.
10. In this place, there are not many very rich people.
11. In this place, there are not many people in the 99.5th percentile.
12. I feel that a person must be very educated to get into a top school.
13. I feel that a person must be very intelligent to get into a top school.
14. In this place, there are not many people whose parents went to top schools before.
15. The headline is: Colleges of excellence: Are you a top candidate?
